item.title: Could trilateral talks yield a breakthrough in Ukraine-Russia war?
item.description: It’s the first time representatives from Kyiv, Moscow and Washington have come together since the full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022.

item.title: How Soviet urban planning is helping Russia freeze Ukraine
item.description: Thousands of people are affected when heating plants are targeted by Russian forces.

item.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,432
item.description: These are the key developments from day 1,432 of Russia’s war on Ukraine.

item.title: Russian strike on Ukraine's Kyiv leaves 1,330 buildings still without heat, mayor says - Reuters
item.description: Russian strike on Ukraine’s Kyiv leaves 1,330 buildings still without heat, mayor says ReutersRussia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,431 Al Jazeera‘We have to keep people warm’: The Ukrainian energy workers risking their lives as Russia targets critical facilities CNNKyiv is freezing in the dark as Russian strikes leave Ukraine’s capital powerless NBC NewsRussian strikes knock out heat in freezing Kyiv as peace talks continue NPR

item.title: Ukraine's Military Is Using Unmanned Ground Robots That Could Change Warfare - bgr.com
item.description: Ukraine’s Military Is Using Unmanned Ground Robots That Could Change Warfare bgr.comHow Drone Engineers are Helping Robotize the Military UkrinformUkrainian soldiers surprised a robot maker by using a drone to drop one of its bots into battle Business InsiderUkraine’s robot machine gunner held off Russia for six weeks The TelegraphUkrainian servicemen operate an unmanned ground vehicle fit for delivery missions on the frontline in Donetsk region&nbsp…

item.title: Ukraine’s Zelenskyy says US security agreement ‘100% ready’ to be signed
item.description: Ukrainian leader says Kyiv and Moscow continue to have 'fundamentally different' positions on territorial concessions.

item.title: Zelenskyy touts ‘constructive’ trilateral talks between the US, Russia and Ukraine in Abu Dhabi
item.description: Ukraine's Zelenskyy calls recent US-Russia-Ukraine talks in Abu Dhabi "constructive," marking potential breakthrough in diplomatic efforts to end the war.

item.title: Russia, Ukraine to discuss territory as Trump says both sides 'want to make a deal'
item.description: Abu Dhabi hosts trilateral meeting with the U.S., Ukraine and Russia in a possible sign that the nearly four-year war could be coming to an end.
